Login.title: Welcome to Midas
Login.subtitle: Fill the following form to login
Login.usernameMinLength: The username must be at least 3 characters
Login.usernameMaxLength: The username must be at most 10 characters
Login.passwordMinLength: The password must be at least 8 characters
Login.passwordMaxLength: The password must be at most 20 characters
Login.generalError: An error has occurred while logging in

Dashboard.subheader: Check your personal finances effortlesly with Midas

Accounts.subtitle: Please fulfill the accounts details
Accounts.accountMinLength: The account code must be at least 5 characters
Accounts.accountMaxLength: The account code must be at most 20 characters
Accounts.descriptionMinLength: You have to write a short description for the account
Accounts.descriptionMaxLength: The description must be at most 100 characters
Accounts.typeMinLength: You have to select a type for the account
Accounts.commentsMaxLength: The optional comments must be at most 1000 characters
